name: Beat Slicer
description:
Slice to the beat in the ultimate music game! Swipe in the direction of the arrow on the cube to slice the cube. Be careful, timing is everything! Tap your feet as you slice the floating cubes to the beat.

• SWIPE each cube in the direction of the arrow
• FEEL the beat as your guide to the top score!
• SLICE to the rhythm and keep that streak going!
• PERFECT your way to the top in this new and exciting rhythm game!
